channel.title: MidwestWeekends - Travel in Minnesota, Wisconsin, Illinois, Iowa
channel.description: Up-to-date information on travel in the Upper Midwest

item.title: Artistic Grand Marais
item.description: On the shores of Lake Superior, this once-rugged village is a cultural outpost.

item.title: Party in Milwaukee
item.description: Summer is one long festival in this easygoing city on Lake Michigan.

item.title: 10 great day trips around Milwaukee
item.description: Ride trolleys, see lighthouses, spot birds and hike past mansions.

item.title: Best of summer
item.description: The best hiking, bicycling, canoeing, kayaking, wildlife-watching, backpacking, camping, shopping, cruising and train rides in the Upper Midwest.

item.title: Baraboo's gilt complex
item.description: In Ringlingville, the golden age of the circus never ended.

item.title: Playtime in Milwaukee
item.description: For children, this easygoing Wisconsin city is just the right size.

item.title: Homes for the holidays
item.description: For Christmas, historic mansions up the ante on opulence.

item.title: Barn storming
item.description: Driving tours in five states showcase these simple but cherished farm buildings.

item.title: Agates in Moose Lake
item.description: Every year in July, Moose Lake introduces budding rockhounds to the thrill of the hunt.

item.title: America's freshwater Riviera
item.description: On the gorgeous beaches of Wisconsin, Michigan, Indiana and Illinois, everyone can find a spot in the sun.

item.title: Beaches of Minnesota's North Shore
item.description: Agate-hunters, storm-watchers and picnickers all want to be close to the edge.

item.title: Where eagles land
item.description: Winter is anything but slow at the big birds' favorite gathering spots in Minnesota, Wisconsin, Iowa and Illinois.
